description:
How to use Power Point to self advertise on Twitter Facebook and much more.

If your just starting out trying to bring people to your blog or web page this is a great organic way to bring in free traffic.

I struggled for months trying to get organic traffic to my website and was about out of cash to pay for it.

So I started using Power Point to make my own content to tweet out instead of paying twitter or Facebook to do it for me.

Using paid advertising along with this course works great says Jill Spence of Atlanta

"In the long run it saved me so much. Now when I tweet a picture I made on PowerPoint it gets way more clicks and likes than my boring text ever did Thanks abunch.....Kristina Lawson of Florida"


We well take and open powerpoint and build a Tweetable image and or a postable photo or advertising content.

Then we will save and store our file to go and grab.

How to find and tweet or post your content out for the world to see and share

You will also find in this course a short rundown on how you can use iMovie to make content for your courses,Websites and all social media posts including blogs and YouTube videos
title: Self Advertise Using PowerPoint Twitter and Facebook on ios
